title: Short-Term Course on Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Using an Online Feedback System

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment process in digitally equipped environments, designed to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies for learners preparing for professional careers

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify over 80% of errors occurring during mathematical problem-solving processes via online feedback systems
Learners refine and apply problem-solving strategies through three or more iterative improvements based on peer/system feedback
Learners develop self-directed learning plans utilizing adaptive feedback features provided in mobile environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
